120b7: su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha'i rgyud med pa'i phyir rul
120b8: khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub

121a1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau sha ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka
121a2: 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa tshad
121a3: med do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
121a4: po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni
121a5: dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// brtson 'grus
121a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
121a7: daphyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
121a8: kau shi ka de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad

121b1: med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
121b2: zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su
121b3: med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rang stong pa nyid tshad med do// nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
121b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i
121b5: chang ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha'i tshad med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid tshad med do// phyi stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab
121b6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
121b7: da ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta skye dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med
121b8: de/ nam mkha' chad med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// ke shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang

122a1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ka sha ka de na 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong ba nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai sha~M
122a2: ka'adi lnga ste dper nanam mkha' tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chang med de/
122a3: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin
122a4: 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau sha ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka 'ad lta sgo dpe na nam mkha'i ched ni dmigs su ma dang // kau shi ka de bzhin
122a5: chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid tshad med do// chen po stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do//
122a6: shika don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa sto
122a7: pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau sha ka de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su medade/ nam mtha
122a8: tshad med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang

122b1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta sa
122b2: dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med do// 'dus byas
122b3: stong pa nyid tshang meng ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chad med do/ / kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid tsha du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa
122b4: tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shri ka de ni 'di ltar 'dras ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshod ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka de bzhin du
122b5: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
122b6: tshad med do/ / kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka ni 'ang
122b7: ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / ki shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang
122b8: kyang dmigs su med don ma mkha'i tshad med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad mad //

123a1: kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
123a2: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang
123a3: dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do//
123a4: kau shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
123a5: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshed ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de
123a6: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
123a7: tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//
123a8: kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper nanapa mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad

123b1: med do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
123b2: du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// ke shi
123b3: ka de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab
123b4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
123b5: kai shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kaM shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// ke shi ka de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
123b6: tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// sha ke/
123b7: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
123b8: kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad

124a1: med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ / mi dmi gsopa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad mar
124a2: pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi
124a3: ka'adi lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/
124a4: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin/
124a5: pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du ngo bo nyid
124a6: stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do// de bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med
124a7: pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med/
124a8: do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med de// kau shi ka de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dngos

124b1: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang med do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa tshad med pa'i phyir
124b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med de// kau shi ka 'di lta
124b3: ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa tshad med do//
124b4: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka yang drag par spong ba tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin
124b5: pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka
124b6: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba tshad med do// yang dag par spong ba tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
124b7: pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
124b8: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su

125a1: med/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang padu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dbang po tshang med
125a2: pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di
125a3: lta ste dper na rnam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyi/ tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dbang po tshad med do//
125a4: dbang po tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka stobs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa
125a5: ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka de bzhin du stobs rnams
125a6: tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir stobs tshad med do// stobs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kai shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub
125a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//
125a8: shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha'i tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag

125b1: tshad med do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
125b2: chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta sted par na nam mkha'i
125b3: tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad
125b4: med do/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka' bags pa'i bden pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
125b5: po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni
125b6: dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'bags pa'i bden pa tshad med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad
125b7: med pa'i phyir shes rapa kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka pasam gtan tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/
125b8: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka de bzhin du bsam gtan

126a1: rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bsam gtan tshad med do// bsam gtan tshad med pa'i phyir shwa rab kyi pha rol du byed pa tshad med do// kau shi ka byams pa
126a2: tshad med pa'i byer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau sha ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau
126a3: shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du byams pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir byams pa tshad med do// byams pa
126a4: tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka snying rje tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/
126a5: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du snying rje'i tshad kyang
126a6: dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir snying rje tshad med do// snying rje tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dga' ba tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub
126a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka de ni 'di ltar dga' ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka 'di lta ste
126a8: dper na nam mkha' tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du dga' ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dga' ba tshad med do// dga' ba tshad med pa'

126b1: phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka btang snyoms tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
126b2: kade ni 'di ltar btang snyoms kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du btang snyoms kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad
126b3: med pa'i phyir btang snyoms tshad med do/ / btang snyoms tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka gzugs cad med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir
126b4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//
126b5: kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs
126b6: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med do/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
126b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ang tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i//
126b8: tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa tshad med do// rnam par thar pa tshad med pa'i phyir/

127a1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad
127a2: med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi
127a3: kade bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med do// mthar gyis gnas/
127a4: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
127a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i tshad ni
127a6: dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshad kyang
127a7: dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa tshad med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
127a8: smon pa med pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa

127b1: 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka
127b2: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa tshad med do// mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
127b3: ba tshad med do/ / kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams
127b4: kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kai shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir
127b5: ting nge 'dzin tshad med do/ / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
127b6: rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka
127b7: de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo tshad med do// gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// /
127b8: kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar

128a1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' tshad ni dmigs su medade// kau shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
128a2: rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do//
128a3: shi ka me 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shaM ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
128a4: tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ma
128a5: 'jigs pa tshad med do/ / mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
128a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su
128a7: med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med do// so so yang dag par rig pa
128a8: tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka snying rje chen po tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa

128b1: ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di sa skyed par nanam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su medado// kai she kA bzhin du snying rje chen po'i tshad kyang dpon
128b2: su med de/ / nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po tshad med do// snying rje chen po tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad
128b3: med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i rdzi re zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su
128b4: med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir
128b5: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshan med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub/
128b6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste
128b7: dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do// nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med do// thams
128b8: cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha ro/

129a1: du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
129a2: kau shi ka de bzhin du lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir
129a3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ / kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
129a4: zhe na kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do// kai sha ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
129a5: pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do//
129a6: shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni tshad med pa ste// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// /
129a7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya bcu bdun pa/ kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
129a8: yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol

129b1: du phyin pa 'ang mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka 'du shes mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
129b2: rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
129b3: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha'
129b4: yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// /
129b5: kai shi ka mig mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmatha
129b6: so/ / kau shi ka rna ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i mtha' dang dbus
129b7: mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka sna mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dre ni 'di ltar sna'i
129b8: mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka lce mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na kau shi

130a1: de ni 'di ltar lce'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka lus mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
130a2: kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka yid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
130a3: kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
130a4: ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka sgra mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke shi
130a5: de ni 'di ltarasgra'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka dri mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
130a6: pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ga de ni 'di ltar dri'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka ro mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir/
130a7: zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka reg mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
130a8: de ni 'di ltar reg gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka chos mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi kade

130b1: ni 'di ltar chos kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
130b2: phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du
130b3: phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
130b4: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i
130b5: phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka lus kyi
130b6: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang
130b7: dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i byed zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid
130b8: kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/

131a1: ma pa ga yar sa ga/ k+Sha ba ma rgya dngasams pa
131a2: rnams kyi pha rol byed pa' tha' yas pate/ dkyi byang zhin/ gnag don 'di sbyar rnga ba'i 'dus tu ga pa 'amatha' dang pas mi dmigs so// kaushi gas nyi das sto ga sum mas pa'i sa
131a3: sems da chen po rams kyi pha rol phyin pa mtha' yas padz+ra/ de tso'i byang nan/ kau shi gden 'di skar sna'i 'phru reg pa'i mtha' nga dbus mi da migs so// gshig kyis kyi g+sa sa Sh+Ta
131a4: pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di/ mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke shi ka
131a5: las kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shri ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rdzi bya
131a6: da dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka yod kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
131a7: 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du
131a8: byed pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka don 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha

131b1: yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi
131b2: dmigs so/ / kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi/
131b3: ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
131b4: rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
131b5: gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
131b6: tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
131b7: yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
131b8: dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka chu'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang

132a1: rnguchub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka
132a2: me'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar me'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
132a3: dmigs so/ / kau shi ka rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams
132a4: kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi/
132a5: ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
132a6: mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka ma rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132a7: chen po rnams kyi pha rol du byin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
132a8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha'

132b1: yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mthar dang dbu ma mi dmigs so//
132b2: kau shi ka ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ming dang gzugs kyi mtha'
132b3: dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka skye mched drug mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di
132b4: lhar skye mched drug gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
132b5: kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
132b6: phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka sred pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa
132b7: ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau she ka len pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
132b8: yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka srid pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin

133a1: pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka skye ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
133a2: rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rba shi mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
133a3: chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i mtha' dang dbras mi dmigs so// kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
133a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar smin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//
133a5: shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrim
133a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbyas mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ki bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa
133a7: ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
133a8: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka

133b1: gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
133b2: pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
133b3: kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
133b4: yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
133b5: phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' mas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
133b6: chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
133b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka/ chen po stong pa nyid
133b8: mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems de pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi

134a1: dmigs so/ / kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shI ka de ni 'a
134a2: ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka 'dus pas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
134a3: de ci'i phyir nen kau shi ka den 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbas mi dmigs so// kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
134a4: du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
134a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka thog ma dang
134a6: tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
134a7: nyid kyi mtha' dang dpas mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyi'i zhe na/
134a8: kau shi ka da ni 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du

134b1: phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de co'i phyir zhe na/ kai sha ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
134b2: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shaM ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
134b3: nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
134b4: dmigs so/ / kau shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
134b5: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
134b6: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
134b7: po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas
134b8: pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/

135a1: kau shi ka dran pa'i bar bzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag
135a2: pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
135a3: da ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/
135a4: pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135a5: chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
135a6: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir
135a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi
135a8: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i

135b1: pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shaM ka 'phags pa'i bden pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'abs pa ste/ de tsa
135b2: bya'i zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang // dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
135b3: rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
135b4: dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyi 'i zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
135b5: mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyi
135b6: mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni
135b7: 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
135b8: du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

136a1: dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par
136a2: thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin
136a3: pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
136a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kai shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha'
136a5: yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir she na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi
136a6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
136a7: pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka ma 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
136a8: zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du

136b1: phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
136b2: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
136b3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha
136b4: yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kai shi ka thams/
136b5: cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus
136b6: mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lan
136b7: gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa
136b8: ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin

137a1: pa 'di gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / ro rab mtha' yas pa dang / 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / big batha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha'
137a2: yas pa dang / sngar tha' yas pa dang / lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa dang / yid mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / sgra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa dang / ro mtha' yas pa dang / reg
137a3: mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pra dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
137a4: padang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ga gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / kwa'i 'dus te dag pa
137a5: mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / ba
137a6: 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
137a7: tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / me'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams ma
137a8: yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ming dang

137b1: gzugs batha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang / reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba tha'
137b2: yam pa dang rga shi mtha' yas pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khribs kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
137b3: byin pa mtha' yas pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa'i
137b4: mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
137b5: da mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha'
137b6: yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /
137b7: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
137b8: pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang

138a1: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brkyad
138a2: mtha' yas pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha'
138a3: yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtha' yas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
138a4: pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang / snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /
138a5: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa
138a6: dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
138a7: dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ dmigs pa mtha' yas bri
138a8: phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

138b1: panyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sepas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi gzhan yang
138b2: chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ da ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// brgya byin gyis sbas pa
138b3: btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin
138b4: zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du
138b5: phyin pa'o/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang / dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab
138b6: pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
138b7: yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mtha' yas so// dmigs pa mtha' yas
138b8: pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so/ / kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// kau shi ka gzhan

139a1: yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa
139a2: gang gis ni sems cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems
139a3: 'dri lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bladags kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma
139a4: yin te/ 'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming btags pa/ dngos po med par ming du btags pa/ dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kaM
139a5: shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang
139a6: la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod de/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye//
139a7: ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag par gyur pa yod dam/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor
139a8: de ni med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol

139b1: du phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ / de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud med du bcas
139b2: dag gis lan gsum du chad du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs
139b3: pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de/ bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do// kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang
139b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bzung bar bgyi'o/ / chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ gzugs ma mtsher ba 'am/
139b5: 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gam rna ba 'am/ sna 'am lce 'am/ lus sam yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am dri'am/ ro 'am reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/
139b6: ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus
139b7: te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te
139b8: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i

140a1: khams sa pa/ me'i khabs sam// rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/
140a2: bye ma nged drug gas/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ smyon pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
140a3: po 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid ste
140a4: panying ngam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba
140a5: med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
140a6: dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sapa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ brad
140a7: chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
140a8: pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa

140b1: rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sapa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sa pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'
140b2: snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub
140b3: 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyis kyang / theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te
140b4: gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang bcas pa rnams
140b5: la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig
140b6: gam/ rna ba 'am/ snga 'am lce 'am/ lus sam yid dpa/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes
140b7: pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sku'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lha'i 'dus
140b8: te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus

141a1: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba 'am/ lo'i 'das te ga pa'i rgyun gyis tshang ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chen gyis tsho ba nga/
141a2: sam/ nu'i gams sam/ ma'i khams sam/ rang gi khams sam/ nam mkha' khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'ad byang ngam/ rnams shes pa'am/ yang dang gzu
141a3: da drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ char pa'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga sha 'am/ sman pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du yin pa 'am/ bzang bar par
141a4: pa pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ shesnga rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyin stong pa nyid dam/
141a5: gted stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ de na dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus la byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid da la/ thogs dang tha ma
141a6: panyid ngam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa sto
141a7: pang/ de bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nyes bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams samadabang po mas sam/
141a8: zas rnams srapa/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sapa/ tshad med pa rnams sam

141b1: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smod pa
141b2: med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam// so so yang dag par
141b3: rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
141b4: 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos gsang mi dmigs mod kyi/ theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/ gsum
141b5: gang zhen/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi
141b6: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las theg
141b7: pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las
141b8: gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin

142a1: gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin
142a2: gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// phyi stong
142a3: pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs
142a4: pa mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
142a5: las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin
142a6: gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/
142a7: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las
142a8: gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshes

142b1: pa mi dmigs so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dran
142b2: bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma dmigs so// rdza ba phral gyi rkang pa rnams las/
142b3: gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dbang po rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
142b4: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i
142b5: bden pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin
142b6: gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs
142b7: pa mi dmigs so/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
142b8: med pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du yang

143a1: de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / gzungasanan ma las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las ga
143a2: gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// so so yang dag gas panamapalas gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs par dam
143a3: byams pa chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ / snying rje chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las
143a4: du yang de bzhin gsheg pa pa mi dmigs so/ / thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa/
143a5: mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu ba na brgad pa/ lha'i bu
143a6: dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di bdag thams cad la slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la slob po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob bo// bsod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
143a7: slob po/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob so// rang stong pa nyid gno pa nyid la slo
143a8: phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob po/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob po// chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus byas da la

143b1: dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob po/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob po// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob po// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob po// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob po// chos thams
143b2: cad stong pa nyid la slob po/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob po// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyin la slob po// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob po// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
143b3: la slob po/ / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob po// yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob po// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob po// dbang po rnams la slob po// stobs rnams la slob po// byang chub kyi yan
143b4: lag rnams la slob po/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob po// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob po// bsam gtan rnams la slob po// tshar med pa rnams la slob po// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
143b5: par 'jug pa rnams la slob po/ / rnam par thar pa rnams la slob po// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob po// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
143b6: slob bo/ / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob po// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob po// mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob po//
143b7: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob po// byams pa chen po la slob po// snying rje chen po la slob po// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob po// lan
143b8: cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid la slob po// rang byang chub la slob bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slong po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

144a1: la slob po/ / lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i drang
144a2: gang gi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zhabra bring byed cing / rgyal po'i khab pad mo yod pa'i nang gi tshad 'das kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i
144a3: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
144a4: du yin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//
