283a7: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
283a8: 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang

283b1: gdugs dang tshal mtshan dang ba ngani dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// pu drang du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med
283b2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra
283b3: bcom pa nyid thob po/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob po/ 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//
283b4: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu gsum mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
283b5: gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rdzas bsod nams mang du 'phel
283b6: bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du min pa 'di
283b7: glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba'am kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la
283b8: rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo slob cing / yang dag pa'i skyod med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang /

284a1: 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang /
284a2: 'theb par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub zab par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa
284a3: dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par
284a4: 'gyur ba dang / bla na pad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang ba
284a5: rga'ir bstad to/ / kau sha ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
284a6: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
284a7: pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
284a8: dar ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / ngos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa snang pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong

284b1: pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / pi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
284b2: so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs
284b3: kye bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab gyur// kau shi ka sems
284b4: can gcig gcig rkun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi la ba la bkod
284b5: pas ni ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol sor gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba
284b6: ma yin no/ / kau shi ka rgyan du zhugs pa'i zhugs bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir
284b7: bor ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ kau shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rkun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir
284b8: 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pabs/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig gcig dang byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches

285a1: par du 'phel lo/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can
285a2: gcig gcig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
285a3: gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyan du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
285a4: dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di
285a5: ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus/ me tog dang phreng ba dang
285a6: spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur ba sting bya ba dang / pu dung du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am
285a7: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa gyur na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas me bdu dpal
285a8: lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab

285b1: pha rol du phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos
285b2: rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/
285b3: to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom
285b4: pa nyid thob par gyur to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
285b5: rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
285b6: 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod
285b7: pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
285b8: ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang

286a1: babang bskang pa'ad dang / dong ba med pa stong pa'i dang / rang brjid stong pa nyid dang / tshang thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / me dpags pa stong pa nyid dang /
286a2: med pa stong pa nyid dang / ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
286a3: lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
286a4: yod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pargyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / glen pa med pa med par
286a5: ngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
286a6: chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa grangs pad pa rgya char bstan to// ka da ba grang
286a7: rab kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi rnga bo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri glegs bam du byas te/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de ni bsod dbas reb par
286a8: 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher stan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// zab pa'i rigs na

286b1: mthe bo rnams yang ngo do/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnabs yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i res kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// ba'i lha rnapas yod do// dgas ldan gyi
286b2: rnabs yod do/ / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshong pa lha nye pa kyi lha rnags yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi ldan pas yod do//
286b3: rdzangs chen gyi lhan pa sa yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yang de// rlung sdang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang banyi b+ha rnabs yod do// kun thang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dung dge
286b4: rnams pa nga/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ya // dgargyas kyi lnga rnams yod // ra ba'i lha rnams yod do// rang ri'i lha rnams yang gi/ dper che ba'i lharnams med de// bras bu che ba'i gyurna bas ya /
286b5: be ba'i sgra rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ya dang // shid du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// sman po sdang ba'i lharna pas yong // 'og ser gyi rtsa rnam pa yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas se pa da
286b6: rnams yod do/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ rang zang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes par 'du shes med pade skye mched kyi lha rngabs yod do// smin pa'i pha rol du
286b7: bye pa yod do/ / tshul khribs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong da// bzod pa'i pa'i mdu byed pa yod do// brtson 'grub kyi pha rol drabyen pa yod do/ bsapa gtan gyi pha rol du phyid pa yod do// shes rab kyipha rol du pa
286b8: dag/ stong pa nyid ya nga// bya stong pa nyid med // byi dang / pa nyid 'dag// gang ba nyid pa pa nyid la dang/ 'das bya da dang // dad pa pa da

287a1: de/ 'das pa mas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// theg pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad
287a2: nga pa nyid yod do/ / rangag mam ma sbed pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// de bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngas pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid snang pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye
287a3: par bzhag pa rnams yang ngo do/ / yang dag par spang ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yang ngo do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yang
287a4: lag brgyad pa yod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// /
287a5: mthar gas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod dos mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
287a6: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod de// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yang de/ snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
287a7: pa rnams yod do/ / rdzun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yang das pa byang chub yod do// las gyi rnam pa shes
287a8: nyid yang ngo / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams yod de// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod de// dasnga nams yod de// rang sa byas rnam

287b1: do byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/
287b2: keka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
287b3: kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel las/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
287b4: gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
287b5: rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher stan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
287b6: rngan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
287b7: 'thab po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//
287b8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par

288a1: rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
288a2: pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
288a3: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
288a4: dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
288a5: pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
288a6: dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsapa gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa bzhi
288a7: dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin
288a8: thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams

288b1: pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ros tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgyache rab star to// kai shaM ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'ang rags kyi
288b2: mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas na 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de rje
288b3: phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de/
288b4: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams stong ngo //
288b5: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha
288b6: rnams yod do/ / sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// rang dge'i lha rnams yod do// rang me
288b7: dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
288b8: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shinr-i tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og yin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha'

289a1: yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims
289a2: pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong
289a3: pa nyid yod do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das
289a4: pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa
289a5: stong pa nyid yod do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul
289a6: kyi rkang pa rnam pa yod do/ / dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
289a7: rnams yod do/ / bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod
289a8: ngo / / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mod pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

289b1: rnams yod do/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do// tanang zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong
289b2: ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan
289b3: gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
289b4: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
289b5: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
289b6: 'das mang ngo / / bde ba gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / ze ba
289b7: kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
289b8: shad / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig/

290a1: phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par kur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thoH
290a2: par 'gyur ro/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sgod med par zhugapa
290a3: par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke shi ka/
290a4: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtsod 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi ba
290a5: rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
290a6: stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
290a7: nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
290a8: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi

290b1: dang / bas pa gtan bzhi dang / tshad yod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brkyang dang bathad kyis gnas pa'i thams par 'jug pa dag dang / rnam par thar pa' /
290b2: stong pa nyi dang/ mtshan pa meng pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdon par shes pa rnabs dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de zan gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang gas
290b3: dpa lo so yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba ched po dang / btang skams rin po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
290b4: med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ / kau shi ka rna ba grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du gis shing / klag pa dang / shi ba dang / 'don dus pa'i
290b5: gzhan la zin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches ma bdu 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las ches thabs cad rgamed bstan te/
290b6: ngag yeng pas rga la rigs che zhing ma tho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de// kyem bdag gi rigs na zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rdul chen ba'i'i ris kyi lnga rnams yod do// sum pa na
290b7: gsum bu lha rnams yod do/ / mtshe ma'i lha rlapas yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnapapa yod de// 'phral dga'i 'a yas yod do// gzhang 'phral dbang byed gyi lha rnam pa yo // rangs rab bya lhan pas ye
290b8: thar ga lnga rnams yod do/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ya // sna ba'i lha rnams yang ngo do// rkang snang gi lda rnapa gas pa ya yang snang ba'i lha rnams yod de kun

291a1: nga da ldan ma yong ngo ro/ / dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rkang dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lharna pas yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// rkang che'i lha rnams
291a2: dad pa pa dra/ bram bu ba'i lharnapas yod de// pe che ba'i lha rnams yod do// pi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
291a3: ga yin gyi lha rnapas yod do// nam mkha pa yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i semached kyi lha rnams yod do// 'dra shes med pa
291a4: padang 'i lha rnams yod do/ / snyan pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod de// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsapa gtan gyi
291a5: la du ldan pa yod do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa
291a6: pa nyid med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ro// 8
291a7: yod do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi pa da nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// da sa pa
291a8: pa'ingo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod de// nga chub kyi yan

291b1: sa / / phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yong ngo // bas pa gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams pa to// rtags med pa'i snyoms par 'a
291b2: ma bur gyur pa brgyad pang / / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod de// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// kha dor pa
291b3: rnams yod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod // sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//
291b4: yang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do// rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// pir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//
291b5: rang byang chub yod do// sar gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// sman du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ar ba mas yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod pa/
291b6: bcom pa rnams yang // rang sangs rgyas rnams yad // byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams med // de bzhin gshegs par brab ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
291b7: 'du ba pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgyapa/ / bam po brgya nyi shu brgyad pa/ shig slong gi 'jig rten gyi khams bur bur lta'o// gnyis pa ji/ rten gyi khams
291b8: da srid pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la pas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la ba du bkod na/ kaM sha/ de ji snyas dus mas/ ra bung mngags kyi bu ma de'i bsad nams de 'argyas pa

292a1: las/ gsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
292a2: pa 'di'i glegs bam/ bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mar du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med
292a3: pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
292a4: ra to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
292a5: to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
292a6: skyon med par zhugs par gyur te/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang ma'o// mngon par rdzogs par
292a7: 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
292a8: rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen pa stong pa nyid dang / don dang

292b1: pastong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / ngas pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
292b2: sathams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dad pa
292b3: par bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bde
292b4: pazhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
292b5: 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byam
292b6: chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' bo chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
292b7: bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
292b8: shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim par

293a1: gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha
293a2: rnams yod do/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//
293a3: spang ba'i lha rnam sa yod do// rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chu rnarnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lharna pas yong/
293a4: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod
293a5: shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad
293a6: med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do//
293a7: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
293a8: yod do/ / chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod de// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod

293b1: ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / rang ba'i na stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
293b2: ci nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pas yod do// dbang po rnams yod do//
293b3: stongs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de// bsam gtan rnams yod do// da peng ba rnams yod do// gzugs/
293b4: med pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med
293b5: yod do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa
293b6: rnams yod de/ / snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra
293b7: bcom pa nyid yod do/ / rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod de// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod
293b8: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//

294a1: kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba
294a2: bcu'i las kyi lam la nges tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
294a3: la mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la
294a4: byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu
294a5: 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
294a6: bu thob par 'gyur to/ / 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs
294a7: rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//
294a8: 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi

294b1: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i ba rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bas man na
294b2: gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / rang stong pa nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / donod pa pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
294b3: stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid dang thog ma mam pa dang stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
294b4: dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
294b5: spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lab yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnab par thar pa
294b6: brkyang dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
294b7: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dzangs pa bcwa brgyad dang / byabs pa rab
294b8: dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ging

295a1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
295a2: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing 'thob rnams
295a3: yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha/
295a4: rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams sod
295a5: do/ / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// drang
295a6: che'i lha rnams yod do/ / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi
295a7: rnams yod do/ / dam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zar med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnapas yod do/
295a8: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyis rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// dang stong

295b1: snang yod do/ / phyir stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong nyid yod do// rkye po stong pa nyid yod // ngan da yang // rnamamasapanyad yang ngo // bstod pa'i
295b2: las 'as pa sto yod pam dang tha ma meng pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / dong ba med pa stang ba nyid yod do// rang bzhi yadang / rgyas thams cad sto/ du yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod de/ mi pa
295b3: bstong pa nyid yod do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
295b4: rnams yod do/ / dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsapa gtan rnams yong ngo // rang maM
295b5: pa rnams med do/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dge mtshan ma med pa dang / smod
295b6: pa med pa yod do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rna par
295b7: yod do/ / ming rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig par 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgrabacom pa nyid
295b8: do/ / rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod de// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom

296a1: rnams yod do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shA
296a2: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/
296a3: kade ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
296a4: kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la zin na/ bsod nams ches mang
296a5: du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang
296a6: dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
296a7: 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnam
296a8: kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bA

296b1: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i
296b2: sa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
296b3: phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
296b4: dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
296b5: ngagi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa
296b6: cang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar
296b7: nga dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzus
296b8: sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /

297a1: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi
297a2: pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i mir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
297a3: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing ma tho ba rnams yod do//
297a4: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//
297a5: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba la
297a6: lha rnams yod do/ / kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge pa'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung gi'i lha
297a7: rnams yod do/ / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i yurnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nepa sdang ba'i lha rnga pas yod do//
297a8: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med

297b1: min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grub kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
297b2: phyin pa yod do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// mi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa
297b3: nyid yod do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa
297b4: nyid yod do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
297b5: nyid yod do/ / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags
297b6: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad
297b7: yod do/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod de// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
297b8: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob pa rnam pa yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcwa

298a1: brgyad yod do/ / rnyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
298a2: yod do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod
298a3: do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag
298a4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
298a5: shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'bel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
298a6: kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ glag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i
298a7: phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs
298a8: par gyur to/ / 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du 'grus pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byer

298b1: mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob
298b2: po/ / thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
298b3: tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang
298b4: tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
298b5: stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
298b6: nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
298b7: med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang // yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang
298b8: byang rab pa yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha pa'i sgo sang

299a1: pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
299a2: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan
299a3: dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ / kau shi ka rnal grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bye ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de
299a4: bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho
299a5: pa rnams yod do/ / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams
299a6: yod do/ / dka' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi
299a7: lha rnams yod do/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung
299a8: dga'i lha rnams yod do/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod

299b1: ro mche ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nol sdang ba'i lha rnalas yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
299b2: yod do/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med mid skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyor ba'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul
299b3: khribs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtan 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes ra
299b4: pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi dang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod
299b5: de/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa
299b6: da yod do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar
299b7: bzhag pa rnams yod de/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
299b8: brgyad pa yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar

300a1: kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
300a2: kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyur/
300a3: du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
300a4: pa nyid yod do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yang do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod de// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300a5: chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
300a6: rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
300a7: la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang do// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
300a8: kyis bka' stsal pa kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams

300b1: sa yang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ka sha ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya dar bstan te/ de dag la bsrabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu lo da
300b2: dag pa'i rten med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob pa// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir dong ba'i 'bras bu thob par thar to// 'thab
300b3: tho pa 'gyur ro/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// theb par 'gyur ro// dgra bcos pa nyid thob par gyur te/ 'thab po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la da
300b4: sa rang ba chu ba thob par gyur to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// par chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'a
300b5: bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'chad na'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gsheg zag pa mepa
300b6: kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa' pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
300b7: gtanag pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid da/
300b8: pasnang pa'ang dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg pa dang tham med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /

301a1: pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
301a2: nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
301a3: lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa pa dang smon pa
301a4: med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
301a5: kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam/
301a6: grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du
301a7: 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram
301a8: ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod

301b1: do/ / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga' lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lta/
301b2: rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad mer snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// rang
301b3: dga'i lha rnams yod do/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu re ba'i
301b4: lha rnams yod do/ / mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong pa'i lha rnams yod de// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas/
301b5: mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// drang zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa
301b6: yod do/ / bzang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid
301b7: yod de/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod // don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das
301b8: pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// der ba med pa stong pa nyid yod de// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs

302a1: pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//
302a2: 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// /
302a3: tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yodado// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
302a4: pa dang smon pa med pa yod do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par
302a5: rig pa rnams yod do/ / snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid
302a6: yod do/ / rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom
302a7: pa rnams yod do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gling chen
302a8: po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad

302b1: med pa ba'i dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo// de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
302b2: las/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shA ka de bas rigs kyi bri'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i
302b3: glegs pam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di lta shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med
302b4: pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i tha
302b5: bu thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
302b6: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
302b7: rin po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
302b8: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du

303a1: phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam/ gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
303a2: stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
303a3: dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
303a4: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
303a5: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang //
303a6: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
303a7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
303a8: kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod

303b1: nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
303b2: ro/ / bram ze'i rigs che zhing ma tho ba rnams yod do// khyim po dag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// /
303b3: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
303b4: yod do/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha
303b5: rnams yod do/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che
303b6: ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyis rnams yod do// /
303b7: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrim
303b8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yong

304a1: do/ / phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
304a2: nyid yod do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// ros thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan
304a3: nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod
304a4: do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod de// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
304a5: yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis
304a6: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo
304a7: rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// /
304a8: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa

304b1: thams dad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod de// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub
304b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod de/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
304b3: bar po brgya nyi shu dgu pa/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
304b4: bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
304b5: kyi bu ma de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
304b6: kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glags bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang // ba ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
304b7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug
304b8: go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi da

305a1: pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur
305a2: to/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
305a3: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
305a4: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du
305a5: phyin pa dang / / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
305a6: nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/
305a7: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
305a8: gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar

305b1: kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
305b2: sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang // byams pa chen po dang / snying
