305b3: chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga ga
305b4: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shaM
305b5: da ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi
305b6: rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnabs yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnam
305b7: yod do/ / gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//
305b8: snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dag

306a1: ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// pi che ba'i lha
306a2: rnams yod do/ / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam
306a3: shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyilha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i ba rol du byan pa yod do// tshul khrims
306a4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid
306a5: yod do/ / phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// dom dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//
306a6: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dong ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod/
306a7: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bad
306a8: rnams yod do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lab

306b1: yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams yod do// bsam gtad rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa btung
306b2: yod do/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
306b3: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
306b4: yod do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
306b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig par 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub
306b6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnapas yod do// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams
306b7: lnga zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
306b8: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau sha ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgas mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom

307a1: ldan 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam
307a2: klag pa dang / za ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du la phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya ched
307a3: bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po//
307a4: theb par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob
307a5: po/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
307a6: zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
307a7: bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
307a8: pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong

307b1: pa nyidi dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
307b2: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa
307b3: par bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
307b4: 'phabs pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
307b5: shes pa drag dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa
307b6: 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//
307b7: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i pir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di
307b8: bsod nams nges mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che na

308a1: mtho ba rnams yod do/ / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi
308a2: ldan mas yod do/ / mtsha ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lhanye
308a3: pan gyi lha rnams yod do/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sngang
308a4: dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// tsha ba'i lha rna pas yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do//
308a5: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams yod
308a6: ngo/ / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// dam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
308a7: med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
308a8: phyin pa yod do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

308b1: yod do/ / na po stong pa nyid yod do// ngo dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das so 'i do ngo thog pa dab med stong pa'id yod do/ 'ong bzeng bstod pa'i
308b2: yod do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong
308b3: yod do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rngabs yod de//
308b4: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i sgo zhes par
308b5: 'jug pa rnams yod do/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes
308b6: pa rnams yod do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa napas yod do// snying rje chen po yod
308b7: ngo/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod // pir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bsam pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub
308b8: yod do/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// chun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir la'ong ba rnams med do// gra bcom parnapa

309a1: yod do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka shar
309a2: phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
309a3: 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
309a4: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i
309a5: phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing
309a6: rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig/
309a7: phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras pa thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//
309a8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//

309b1: 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par btsang sa bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka
309b2: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro yang yin pa dang / bsam
309b3: gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid me pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyidi dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
309b4: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa 'di dang / chos thams cad
309b5: stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rna pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bdag
309b6: pa pa'i dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i ngan
309b7: pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes badra dang / tang
309b8: nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang /

310a1: byabs pa cad pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang stoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke sh-i ka nam grangs des kyang rigs kyi nga
310a2: 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// /
310a3: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
310a4: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul
310a5: dga'i lha rnams yod do/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
310a6: yod do/ / snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sdang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun slang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rung dge'i lha rnams yod do//
310a7: tshad med dag pa'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rngams yod do// mi che ba
310a8: lha rnams yod do/ / mi gadrang ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams

310b1: nal shes bza' yas sa pa nga9ka/ rnams yong ngo // cung zad bde pa'i skye ma reng lha rnams yod do// 'du shes pad 'du shes pad mid sera'i de'i lha rnams yod do// srid pa'i pha rol duben pa yang
310b2: rdul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong da bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsapa gtan gyi pha rol du byen pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ye nga / da
310b3: stong pa nyid yod do/ / phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyin pa stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyidi yed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
310b4: yod do/ / mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid yod do// theg pa dang tha ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa 'di yod do// radag par
310b5: stong pa nyid yod do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po khang pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yong
310b6: yang dag par sbeng ba rnams yod do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod
310b7: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ / bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshang med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rngam par thar pa brgyab yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa
310b8: snyoms par 'jug pa bag yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzung sa sre rnams

311a1: yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yad do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod
311a2: do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa
311a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems
311a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
311a5: na ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan shi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi
311a6: ka de ji snyam du sa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
311a7: stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel/
311a8: lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon

311b1: med pa gags par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par
311b2: da de/ / phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras pa thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur
311b3: 'be bo/ / thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
311b4: pa'i bar rab tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs paro 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zin pa'i pha
311b5: par phyin pa dang / del khrims kyi pha rol yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pa rol du phyin pa dang // nang stong
311b6: da dang / pi dang ngang pa'i ngang gsong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang can pa stong pa nyid dang/ dod dpa stang ba'i / 'dus pas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
311b7: dang tha ma med pa stong pa'ang dang / dag med pa stong mnyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
311b8: dang / rab dag/ dngas pa par stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nya bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / bya

312a1: chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i the
312a2: pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
312a3: rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshes tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam
312a4: grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glags bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par
312a5: bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnabs yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag
312a6: gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul
312a7: dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod
312a8: tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i

312b1: ldarnams yod do/ / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi
312b2: lha rnams yod do/ / dma'a' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
312b3: sbyin pa'i pha re la duphyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do//
312b4: nang stong pa nyid yod de// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//
312b5: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs
312b6: stong pa nyid yang ngo / / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi
312b7: rkang pa rnams yod do/ / dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod
312b8: ngo/ / tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

313a1: mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//
313a2: so so yang dag par dag pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra
313a3: la pa nyid yod do/ / rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa
313a4: sa yod do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka nub phyogs kyi
313a5: 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga' klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
313a6: mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkar na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das med do// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
313a7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod
313a8: nams chas mngan 'phel la/ / de ci' phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de na 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu

313b1: mo dang / yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'gas par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'otsha ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po//
313b2: theb par 'gyu // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob
313b3: par gyur te/ 'thob po// theb par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
313b4: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang grang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
313b5: dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // rang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
313b6: phyi dang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog yang ngathal med pa stong pa
313b7: dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
313b8: pad pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang / / ngan pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan

314a1: lag brgyad pa dang / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
314a2: mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad
314a3: dadang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
314a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
314a5: rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen
314a6: bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod de/ / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
314a7: ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ / tshangs lnga nye pan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
314a8: da/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnam payod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che

314b1: ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // ga nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam
314b2: mkha' mtha' yas su mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i
314b3: pha rol du yin pa yang ba/ rdu khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod po'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
314b4: ngo / / nang stong pa nyid yod do// kyi spong ba nyid yod do// phyi ning stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa zhing stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// dus byar stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas kyang ba
314b5: yang / / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// der ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nying sdang pa nyid yang
314b6: mi dmigs pa kyang pa nyid yod do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yong ngo //
314b7: 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// rlabs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan
314b8: rna so dang / yang med pa rnam pa yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid nga /

315a1: mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams
315a2: yod do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i//
315a3: 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong
315a4: pa rnams yod do/ / dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
315a5: yod do/ / kau shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de// tshad med pa bzhi dang // gzugs med
315a6: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
315a7: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha tshon du bya ba
315a8: phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing //

315b1: sa kyi ba 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
315b2: bathob par gyur ro/ / 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa/
315b3: dam kyis pa byang chub zab par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// blan
315b4: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rab tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta
315b5: med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
315b6: dang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
315b7: pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
315b8: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /

316a1: lha dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bded pa pa'i dang / rnam par bar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa
316a2: dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzugs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
316a3: dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang // byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang stobs chen po dag
316a4: sangs rgyas kyi chos dad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bapa du bris shing / klag pa dang /
316a5: ze ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya
316a6: rab stan to/ / de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing ma tho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod/
316a7: ngo// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
316a8: ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ / tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//

316b1: tshad med sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge rgyas kyi lha
316b2: rnams yod do/ / che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// me gdung ba'i lha rnams
316b3: yod do/ / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas
316b4: skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
316b5: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag rgya pa// bam po brgya sum bcu pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do//
316b6: bathod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//
316b7: phyi stong pa nyid yod do// / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
316b8: yod do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod

317a1: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
317a2: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/
317a3: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod
317a4: do/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par//
317a5: shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par
317a6: rig pa rnams yod do/ / snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
317a7: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
317a8: yod do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

317b1: ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke shi ka byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i klung gi bya ma snyer gyi sems can
317b2: ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsdam ga tA na zhi la bkod do/ / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la
317b3: rab tu bkod na/ ka sha ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // ba
317b4: ba gshags pa med do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i grags pam/ klag pa
317b5: dang / khaton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches ma du'abaltalo// de sde'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las cag
317b6: ra pa'i rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan/ / de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bya'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// drug bya/ 24
317b7: par 'gyur/ / ldan du zhugs pa'i zab par sbyar// / 'grob 'o// ba par la // lan cig 'ad ba'i 'bras bye thob par gyurato/ /
317b8: 'bra ro// byar mi 'a ba'i zas pa zab par gyu to// yo lo// thob par 'gyur // dpamam pa nyid thal par gyur/ /

318a1: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'a// bya par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem spyad pa' sems dpa' chen po na mas kyang byang chub sa /
318a2: dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
318a3: mad par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur / / kau bag pa med pa'i chos de dag shen/ 'dis te/ b+hin pa'i b.ro la phyin pa nga / tshul
318a4: la gyud padang/ na sa lan phyin padang / #la phyin pa dang/ kyi ma sbyin
318a5: stong pa nga/ sbyinang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid y-i da dang / chen po sto pa nyid dang / don sad dang / 'dus byas / nas sa rgya nga baN+Di / maN+Da mas
318a6: ba stong pa'id dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong bamed pa stod pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
318a7: dmigs pa rlung pa dang / das kyi med pastod pa nyid nga/ pa med ra bag nga dag
318a8: dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pashe dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dran dang / 'phags pa'i lam pan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa pa dang /

318b1: thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
318b2: dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang // byams pa chen po dang
318b3: snying rje rin po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
318b4: la dbyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang // kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
318b5: rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ / de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal ren
318b6: ba'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// ye re ba'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ 'phrul ga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lharnams
318b7: yong/ ngangs ldan par bye lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khod gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lharnams yod do// rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tsha med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ na
318b8: dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i rtswa

319a1: nams yod do/ / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lharnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//
319a2: mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i
319a3: rol du phyin pa yod do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod
319a4: yod do/ / nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
319a5: byas stong pa nyid yod do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi
319a6: mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//
319a7: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
319a8: pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ / bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// / rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i

319b1: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzu
319b2: kyi sgo rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
319b3: yod do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
319b4: yod do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs
319b5: rgyas rnams yod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
319b6: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can je snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhil bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
319b7: pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
319b8: mngango / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de gang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod na blams ma

320a1: su 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs
320a2: par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras/
320a3: du thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang
320a4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
320a5: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
320a6: 'bod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
320a7: pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
320a8: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

320b1: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
320b2: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
320b3: ma med pa dang / glen pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
320b4: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
320b5: med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher stan to/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ten du bya ba'i
320b6: phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/
320b7: ngag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu
320b8: rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ / mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha

321a1: rnams yod do/ / tshangs lnganye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
321a2: tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// ku na snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha
321a3: rnams yod do/ / chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams
321a4: yed do/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye ma ched
321a5: kyi lha rnams yod do/ / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus
321a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen
321a7: po stong pa nyid yod do/ / de na dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod
321a8: do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i

321b1: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yong
321b2: do/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar
321b3: pa brgyad yod do/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin
321b4: rnams yod do/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi
321b5: chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi
321b6: rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod
321b7: do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs
321b8: mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

322a1: 'jug pa bzhi'i dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la par tu bkod na/ ke shi ka de ji snya ba du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang /
322a2: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du
322a3: bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la
322a4: bsla bas shing / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
322a5: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//
322a6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug
322a7: go/ / 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kai shi ka zag pa med pa'i
322a8: chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes

322b1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
322b2: dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong
322b3: pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
322b4: stob ma lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
322b5: thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
322b6: yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher
322b7: bstan to/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams
322b8: ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i

323a1: rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//
323a2: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod
323a3: do/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams
323a4: yod do/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi
323a5: che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / me gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
323a6: kyi lha rnams yod do/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha
323a7: rol du phyin pa yod do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi
323a8: rol du phyin pa yod do/ / dang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid

323b1: yod do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
323b2: yod do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
323b3: yod do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//
323b4: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
323b5: 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
323b6: rnams yod do/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
323b7: 'bras bu yod do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// dang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//
323b8: lan cig phyir long ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa

324a1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / kau shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
324a2: bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la dkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab du bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
324a3: nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
324a4: rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag pa med
324a5: pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
324a6: 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
324a7: to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par 'gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
324a8: skyon med par thugs par gyur to/ / jug go 'dug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

324b1: rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
324b2: rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
324b3: pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
324b4: thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
324b5: bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa ban
324b6: dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin
324b7: thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
324b8: snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab tu

325a1: pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kai shi ka
325a2: ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
325a3: mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//
325a4: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams
325a5: yod do/ / chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge
325a6: rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ / che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams
325a7: yod do/ / shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi
325a8: lha rnams yod do/ / chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// du shes med 'du shes med ni skye ma ched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod

325b1: pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong
325b2: nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa
325b3: stong pa nyid yod do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa
325b4: yod do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod
325b5: ro/ / stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do//
325b6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang /
325b7: smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag
325b8: par rig pa rnam pa yod do/ / snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

326a1: yod do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyi 'o rab rnams
326a2: yod do/ / phyir me 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa nams yod do// rang sangs kyis rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
326a3: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / kau shi ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung dgi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed par de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi
326a4: la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
326a5: rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das med do// bde bar gshegs pa med do// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
326a6: du phyin pa 'di'i glegs papa/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las zag
326a7: pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya char bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhug par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
326a8: par gyur to/ / 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//

326b1: dga' com pa nyid thob par gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rangs sa rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis nga byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
326b2: kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
326b3: 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang ga she/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
326b4: pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / sto
326b5: pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
326b6: nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
326b7: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
326b8: kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par ba

327a1: ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgya dang / mi
327a2: 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang // byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
327a3: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / brib
327a4: dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan
327a5: te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum
327a6: bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ / mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod
327a7: do/ / tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
327a8: kun snang dang po'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams

327b1: yong / / rang bang che bar lha rnams yod de// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// min pa'i lha rnams yod do// ma gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod de// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams na/
327b2: dokhog par gyi narna pas yong do la lab yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' las skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i sgomachad kyi sa rnams yod do// 'du shes me 'dun
327b3: med min snya pa da ky-i lha rnams yod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// rdul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan
327b4: gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa
327b5: stong pa nyid yod do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod
